article_title: The Hunger Games 'Catching Fire' Reveals The Brutal Horrors Of Thuggish Government

article_metadata.description: Catching Fire has nothing to do with capitalism, and everything to do with what happens when it’s abolished in favor of an all-powerful state.
article_metadata.author: John Tamny
